protein.specific_function: Plays a major role in tight junction-specific obliteration of the intercellular space, through calcium- independent cell-adhesion activity

reference.reference_text: Sakaguchi T, Gu X, Golden HM, Suh E, Rhoads DB, Reinecker HC: Cloning of the human claudin-2 5'-flanking region revealed a TATA-less promoter with conserved binding sites in mouse and human for caudal-related homeodomain proteins and hepatocyte nuclear factor-1alpha.
